QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: CommMechanismForObjectManagerAdapter is deprecated. See CIM_WBEMServer, CIM_ProtocolService and CIM_WBEMProtocolServiceCapabilties for describing WBEM Protocols CommMechanismForObjectManagerAdapter is an association between an ObjectManager's communication mechanism and a ObjectManagerAdapter that supports that mechanism to translate requests and responses for the Object Manager.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The specific ObjectManagerAdapter whose communication mechanism with the CIM Object Manager is described.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The encoding/protocol/set of operations that may be used to communicate between the Object Manager and the referenced ProtocolAdapter.
